actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution commending Captain Wei Jiafu and the China Ocean Shipping Company for increasing business relations between the United States and China.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Commends Captain Wei Jiafu and the China Ocean Shipping Company (COSCO) for staying committed to professionalism and promoting citizen participation that increases U.S.-China cooperation. Recognizes: (1) Captain Wei's efforts to improve U.S.-China business relations; and (2) COSCO's support of higher education in the United States and around the world.

titles.title: A resolution commending Captain Wei Jiafu and the China Ocean Shipping Company for increasing business relations between the United States and China.
